definition: Holland/the Netherlands/abbr. for 荷蘭|荷兰[He2 lan2]
to carry on one's shoulder or back/burden/responsibility
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)

sentences.english: Their 10 guilder bill depicts a hummingbird on geometric patterns.
sentences.chinese: 10荷蘭盾紙幣顯示蜂鳥與幾何圖案。

sentences.english: He later agreed to let Gutenberg have a further 800 guilders.
sentences.chinese: 他後來又同意讓古滕伯格多拿800荷蘭盾。

sentences.english: The striking, yellow 50 guilder note features a sunflower prominently.
sentences.chinese: 動人的黃色50荷蘭盾，其中向日葵最顯眼。

sentences.english: During the turmoil in the foreign-exchange markets the guilder remained strong.
sentences.chinese: 荷蘭盾在外匯交易市場的動盪中保持堅挺。

sentences.english: The Dutch guilder was retired in 2002, when it was replaced by the Euro.
sentences.chinese: 荷蘭盾在2002年停用，被歐元取代。
